channel.title: Making items lower your skill level over time. Like potions
channel.description: My server has potions but the levels don't go down afterwards, it just stays at 117. I made a dragon battle axe special also and wanted it to lower all cb stats but str and hp :s.

item.title: Making items lower your skill level over time. Like potions
item.dc:creator: @the_predi the predi
item.description:
@the_predi wrote:

go to your client.java and search for the potion that u use than u will see something like this (addskillxp …)
remove that it will stay like the delay put it on 0

Normally that should work

I hope i helped u

Tell me when it dont work

Read full topic
item.source: Making items lower your skill level over time. Like potions
